name: h3
description: The 2026 Marucci CATX RCKLESS BBCOR Baseball Bat is engineered for peak performance with its drop 3 length to weight ratio and BBCOR .50 certification, making it ideal for high school and college players. Featuring a 2 5/8 inch barrel diameter and a balanced swing feel, this one-piece alloy bat delivers exceptional responsiveness and plate performance thanks to its proprietary AZR Alloy. The bat's ring-free barrel construction enhances barrel flex and production, while the multi-variable wall design creates an expanded sweet spot with forgiving barrel walls. Additional features include an AV3 Vibration Dampener to absorb vibrations for superior comfort, a TFX End Cap for increased forgiveness, a custom knob design for better grip, and an enhanced soft touch grip for improved feel and control. The striking colorway of black, sky blue, and red adds a bold, modern aesthetic to this high-performance bat. Warranty chevron-down chevron-down chevron-down Warranty A Full Manufacturer's Warranty of 365 Days is included. If a warranty issue arises, our Bat Experts are happy to assist you in reaching the manufacturer to get a fast replacement! Begin Your Claim Here: Start My Warranty Claim
